portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: A portfolio showcases a collection of one's work, projects, or achievements, often used for professional or personal presentations, providing a visual and descriptive overview of skills and accomplishments

portfolio.title: InoteBook
portfolio.description: An iNotebook is a digital tool for virtual note-taking, task management, and efficient organization of information. It offers accessibility across devices and facilitates collaboration and synchronization.

portfolio.title: ExpenseTracker
portfolio.description: An expense tracker is a financial tool used to monitor and manage spending, helping individuals or businesses maintain a clear overview of their income and expenses, ultimately promoting better financial control and budgeting.
